I'm skeptical of every wallet that says it's slim. I was pleasantly surprised when I loaded it with 2 IDs, 2 credit/debit cards, 3 insurance cards, a gift card, and a little cash. It's half the thickness of my old "slim" wallet with the exact same contents. The card slots are tight enough to hold, yet not too tight that you can't pull the cards out. I haven't tested the RFID blocking yet.

评论概述: A combination of style, functionality, and security
评论详情: I am extremely impressed with its functionality and design. Easy to carry in my front pocket without causing any bulk. It has a sleek and stylish appearance that perfectly complements any outfit.  RFID technology provides an added layer of security, protecting my valuable information from unauthorized scans.  Overall, I highly recommend the Chelmon slim wallet for men. It is a great combination of style, functionality, and security, making it an essential accessory for anyone who wants to stay organized and protected on the go.

The wallet is a simple and skinny design to fit easily in a pocket. It holds an ID nicely, easy to remove the ID, has the appropriate room for credit cards and cash, not too tight. I bought this for my son's first wallet and put money in it as one of his Christmas gifts, it's wrapped so I don't have a pic.

I got it as a gift for my bf and he absolutely loved it. He said that it's so light sometimes he doesn't feel it when it's in his pocket. My bf likes carrying cash around and this wallet is perfect for him. It has slot for cash and I think 6 card slots. It's very slim and cute.

评论概述: 5 years of daily use and it looks brand-new
评论详情: Bought this 5 years ago, and I'm super impressed with how it's held up. I use it daily, definitely stuff it full of stuff, and it has (a) not stretched out like other wallets have and (b) the corners of the wallet have held up incredibly well -- have not frayed or flaked. Came back to Amazon to figure how much I had paid for it, and was shocked at how little I had for this much quality.  Have bought other similar wallets from Amazon and not had as much luck.
